title: SQL Injection Basic
description: Learn to identify and exploit basic SQL injection vulnerabilities in a web application. This exercise teaches fundamental SQL injection concepts and prevention techniques.

goals.description: Bypass the login authentication using SQL injection
goals.hint: Try manipulating the login form's input to alter the SQL query logic

goals.description: Extract hidden user data from the database
goals.hint: Once logged in, look for ways to modify SQL queries in the user interface
